tool_description: This API gives the brief overview of the  news all around the INDIA
name: Indian News
title: Indian News

api_list.name: Get brief overview of news in INDIA
api_list.description: This endpoint targets the specific newspapers article form the fetch data.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://indian-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/Hindustan Times"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "indian-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://indian-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "indian-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
